name: Return of the Blossoming Blade
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Chung Myung, The 13th Disciple of the Mount Hua Sect, One of the 3 Great Swordsmen, Plum Blossom Sword Saint, defeated Chun Ma, who has brought destruction and disarray onto the world. After the battle, he breathes his last breath on top of the headquarter mountain of the Heavenly Demon Sect. He is reborn after 100 years in the body of a child. ……What? The Mount Hua Sect has fallen? What kind of nonsense is that!?---Links:- Animated PV- Official Traditional Chinese Translation- Official Simplifi
